name: knuckleheadbabylon
text: Rod Huggins has just terrible eyesight.

name: dropkickpikachu
text: A comment left by dropkickpikachu was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Dezufnocosem, tttt2, rascaldom, aquamuffin, prettyrad, luckypyjamas, Lokiamis, J-Man)

name: clembot
text: i don't think so, but nice observation

name: hipjiverobot
text: Nice is not the word I would use to describe this phenomenon.

name: tragicone
text: i would say he is clearly not and that it is just the break in the wall.

name: tekende
text: All in all it's just another break in the wall

name: soticoto
text: ... I can't hate you for quoting the Floyd.

name: philophobe
text: The 6 people who have lamed your observation are not the sort of people with whom I would like to associate.

name: tonyhighwind
text:
Seriously. All the rock hard cat cock in this thing and a bit of terror-scat sours them? These are people who, at the very least, could not watch more than two episodes of Metalocalypse under optimal conditions.

I know that's kind of lame in and of itself, but God damn do I love me some Dethklok.

name: saint
text: How closely do you have to look at his ass to see this? I do not wish to attempt this.

name: plummet
text: In the case of emergency, scream "AL QAEDA" and run like hell through the nearest wall

name: unsentletter
text: It's the thing to do.

name: invidious
text: Doing the Kool-Aid Man's "OH YEAH!" yell right after that is purely optional.

name: invidious
text: Ooo, epic reading through the thread fail.

name: catachresis
text: A comment left by catachresis was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by apocowarg, riotdejaneiro, ColonelColostomy, kenthegod, FablesandBlues, Sargasm, Axhoola, wehavemagnums)

name: mugi
text: It's hilarious how you get lamed for offering insightful, constructive criticism.  Here's a chubby.

name: phoenixultima
text: Am I the only one who can hear Ray shouting "OH YEAH!!" in the kool-aid man voice in this strip?

name: nurdbot
text: To me, he's screaming HIKEEBA. Damn MST3K riffs nobody remembers anymore.

name: seanbad
text: Mitchell!

name: jaldor
text: McCloud!

name: awksedperl
text: Skinner!

name: fineoakstructure
text: Don't forget the accompanying "GYMKATA!"

name: jlynes
text: And why no ads for "SPACOM"?

name: unsentletter
text: You, sir, are a nerd. Well-played! " HE TRIED TO KILL ME WITH A FORKLIFT!! "

name: falseprophet
text: Dude, not just this strip. As far as I'm concerned, Kool-Aid man needs to play the voice of Ray in the upcoming animated movie Achewood: Ultra Peanut's Secret-Sauce .

name: clembot
text: i love this one because it's like one of those scenes in "snatch" or "lock stock and two smoking barrels" where all these things start happening at the same time

name: soticoto
text: Chubby for winning film-references.

name: flavius
text: I was really disappointed in the next strip to realize pat wasn't touching himself to Brave Heart. Now I'm still the only one :*(

name: firesign
text: Previous moments of this story arc can be interpreted to indicate that Ray is also in your camp. Don't lose hope.

name: ssddr
text: I would assume someone leaping through my wall into the bathroom is Al-qaeda too.

name: endoftheworld
text: Man, I picture Andrew Sullivan doing this every day.

name: robobogle
text: This is the funniest couple of strips. I don't understand why more people don't enjoy this as much as I do.

name: thatcrazycommie
text: The fact that people did not rate this strip five, it... I don't know. It makes me very angry. Like they think I am of low mind.

name: soticoto
text:
That is because they are of low mind.
I have voted it 5 though, so worry not.

name: cousinted
text: I really wish I hadn't known about Achewood until the day this was posted, just so it could be the first strip I ever saw.

name: bourbonsamurai
text: The alt-text makes it for me: "Meanwhile, at a series of lectures in a nearby town"

name: tekende
text: Read it in the voice of the narrator from Super Friends.

name: mountaindewtab
text: oh my. alqaida!?

name: blackalex
text: How did Rod break through to Pat's room if he rented the rooms on both sides?

name: biznart
text: You have ruined this for me.  I hope you're pleased with yourself.

name: orvel
text: Any given non-corner motel room actually borders three rooms. There is a room on each side, and also a room opposite the entrance. Usually the bathrooms of these motel rooms are bordering as that would have been the cheapest way to construct the motel.

name: orvel
text: This Yahoo! Answer might help, if I was unclear.

name: apocowarg
text: The only problem is that according to the last comic Ray and Rod are in a corner room filming this. Meaning if they broke in through the wall facing the entrance then Pat would have to be in a corner room which we have established he can't be. The only way it would work would be if Rod broke through in a diagonal direction.

name: rocknrollfaggot
text:
he was so fucking scared he charged through 2 walls! it is reasonable that this is a metaphor for the average american's xenophobia.
actually, that's not reasonable at all.

name: redzerostar
text: he's rich, and rich people can do anything.

name: ummagumma
text:
Here's my theory: Pat was trying to cover his tracks by renting the rooms under an alias. He was going there to watch gay porn, one of his favorite gay porn stars was Rod Huggins, 'nuff said.

Then either Rod himself or one of the other guys did the same when they went to shoot the movie. The understandably confused clerk handed over the keys to one of Pat's three rooms, and the rest is history.

name: apocowarg
text: I like the cut of your jib, sir.

name: tommycrashwreck
text: Pat masturbates with both hands? Since when?

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
man, he's totally playin' with his..putter.......


....waaaaaaaiiit......

name: metatronatra
text: Totally thought Ray was going to bust in on Pat J'in' off; that last strip hell of foreshadowed me into a false assumption

name: tekende
text: Rod's fear of Al-Qaeda makes me wonder if he is a republican. For some reason this idea is very funny to me.

name: ford
text: Is the reason... because he is a gay person, and republicans tend to hate gay people?  That would make sense as a reason.

name: mystkmanat
text: Also, he is a porn star.

name: mugi
text: First panel is wonderful.

name: deusoma
text: On this particular trip through the archives, when I went to this page, I thought the comic title was "Un birthing Rod", which would have been a very different thing indeed.
